name: 百花深处
content: 希望 能一直走在路上
Cuz I wanna put you in my pocket
So I wanna put you in my pocket
身边的朋友 都走了
Cuz I wanna put you in my pocket
就让时间带走 那些痛
I wanna live with you in a sweet home
还是 一个人走在路上
Cruz I wanna put you in my pocket
But I got nothing in my pocket
五音不全的破碎的爱情
Cuz I wanna put you in my pocket
我还在路上 不会停
I wanna live with you in a sweet home
I wanna live with you in a sweet home
I wanna live with you in a sweet home
